data.description: Introduction to: atomic, electronic, and defect structures in materials; diffusional, mechanical and electrical properties of materials; and the role of structure and defects in diffusional, mechanical, and electrical properties.
data.title: MATERIALS SCIENCE-STRUCTURE AND PROPERTY RELATIONS IN SOLIDS

data.description: Laboratory instruction in sample preparation for and applications of quantitative microscopy, x-ray diffraction, and properties measurement in the context of structure-property relationships in materials.
data.title: STRUCTURES & PHASES LAB

data.description: The basic structures and resulting properties of solid materials, including phase equilibria, meta-stability, mechanical properties, failure, corrosion, and materials selection.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO MATERIALS SCIENCE
